column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: A Nigerian man and a Cambodian woman on April 3
column5: went in front of Phnom Penh Municipal Court Judge Kuy Sov
column6: who issued a detention order to Prey Sar prison on charges of fraud.------The first accused was identified as Shehu Bello Akharuku
column8: the second was Kim Srey Kech
column9: a 24-year-old Cambodian female.------On the morning of April 3
column11: the police department of the Counter-Terrorism and Transnational Crimes Department of the Ministry of Interior
column12: sent the Nigerian and a Cambodian to the Phnom Penh Court of First Instance.------It is reported that the pair may be husband and wife. The case was handed over to the Deputy Deputy Prosecutor of the Phnom Penh Municipal Court
column13: before the Judge issued a pre-trial custodial order for the duo.------ Further details of the alleged fraud have not yet been released.
